PHRASE.LANG: Rewarded for free to gifters generous enough to reach Karma level 14 in the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. [#Legal]
Offert gratuitement aux donneurs de cadeaux suffisamment généreux pour atteindre le niveau 14 de Karma dans le Giftinator 9000 de Hellfire Games. [#Legal]
Kostenlose Belohnung für großzügige Geschenkgeber, die es bis auf Karma-Level 14 im Geschenkomat 9000 von Hellfire Games schaffen. [#Legal]
Sei stato premiato gratuitamente da utenti abbastanza generosi da raggiungere il livello 14 di Karma nel Giftinator 9000, Hellfire Games. [#Legal]
Recompensado de forma gratuita a los donantes que han sido tan generosos como para alcanzar un Karma de nivel 14 en el Giftinator 9000 de Hellfire Games. [#Legal]
Rewarded for free to gifters generous enough to reach Karma level 14 in the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. [#Legal]
Rewarded for free to gifters generous enough to reach Karma level 14 in the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. [#Legal]
